Class Server.MultipleServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • Server.MultipleServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Enclosing class:
    Server

    private class Server.MultipleServer
extends java.lang.Thread
    Class that extends Thread class and contains methods to read from ,Clients handle message parsing and set usernames for Clients.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

        java.lang.Thread.State, java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private long clientChatroomTime
      Long field that is used to store the system time when the Client enters the chatroom.
      private boolean finished
      Boolean to be used to allow closing of I/O streams and allow for graceful disconnect from Server.
      private java.net.Socket MULTISOCKET
      Socket constant that stores the socket value of the Client that is connecting to the Server.
      private java.io.BufferedReader serverReader
      BufferedReader that is used to read messages from clients.
      private java.io.PrintWriter serverWriter
      PrintWriter that is used to write messages to clients.
      private java.lang.String usrName
      String field that stores the username of the client.

      • Fields inherited from class java.lang.Thread

        MAX_PRIORITY, MIN_PRIORITY, NORM_PRIORITY

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MultipleServer(java.net.Socket multiSocket)
      Constructor to instantiate a MultipleServer object to handle message parsing and client entering and exiting the chatroom.

    • Field Detail

      • MULTISOCKET

        private final java.net.Socket MULTISOCKET
        Socket constant that stores the socket value of the Client that is connecting to the Server.

      • clientChatroomTime

        private long clientChatroomTime
        Long field that is used to store the system time when the Client enters the chatroom. System time is calculated via the currentTimeMillis in the System class.

      • serverWriter

        private java.io.PrintWriter serverWriter
        PrintWriter that is used to write messages to clients.

      • serverReader

        private java.io.BufferedReader serverReader
        BufferedReader that is used to read messages from clients.

      • usrName

        private java.lang.String usrName
        String field that stores the username of the client.

      • finished

        private boolean finished
        Boolean to be used to allow closing of I/O streams and allow for graceful disconnect from Server.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MultipleServer

        public MultipleServer(java.net.Socket multiSocket)
        Constructor to instantiate a MultipleServer object to handle message parsing and client entering and exiting the chatroom.
        Parameters:
        multiSocket - - the socket that the Client is connecting through.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Method override of the run method in the Thread class. Method sets up the I/O streams via the PrintWriter and BufferedReader classes and then calls the setUsrName and readFromClient methods.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread

      • readFromClient

        private void readFromClient()
        Method to read from clients output stream and then pass the received message onto the message parsing methods. Method reads from Client via the serverReader and only passes not-null messages onto the parseClientMsg method. If the message is null then the logOut method is called

      • parseClientMsg

        private void parseClientMsg(java.lang.String MSG)
        Method to take message as a parameter and detect if it is a broadcast message or a server command. Method looks at the first character of the message and if it is a command message calls the parseClientCommand method. Otherwise it calls the broadcastMessage method.
        Parameters:
        MSG - - The message to be parsed.

      • printMessage

        private void printMessage(java.lang.String MSG,
                          Server.MultipleServer BCASTER)
        Method to print message to output stream of Clients.
        Parameters:
        MSG - - The message to be printed.
        BCASTER - - The Client sending the message.

      • parseClientCommand

        private void parseClientCommand(java.lang.String CMD)
        Method to parse the command message passed as a parameter and call methods to respond to the Client's request. Method uses a switch statement to see which command the command message parameter matches with before calling the method nested within the matching case.
        Parameters:
        CMD - - The command message to be parsed.

      • logOut

        private void logOut()
        Method to close I/O streams and stop continual listening for input from Client. Method uses the close method in the PrintWriter and BufferedReader classes to close the I/O streams before closing the MULTISOCKET and removing the Client's username from the usrNameSet in the Server class.

      • getClientChatroomTime

        private double getClientChatroomTime()
        Method to calculate the length of time the Client has been connected to the chatroom for. Method takes the current system time via the currentTimeMillis method and substracts the clientChatroomTime. It then divides the resulting number by 1000 to format the time into seconds for readability.
        Returns:
        The length of time the Client has spent in the chatroom

      • getHelpCommands

        private void getHelpCommands()
        Method to print out the available commands for the client whilst connected to the server. Method uses the println method from the PrintWriter class to output the available commands to the client.

      • getServerIP

        private java.lang.String getServerIP()
        Method to return server IP address. Method creates InetAddress object and then uses getHostAddress from the InetAddress class to get the server's IP address.
        Returns:
        The IP address of the server.

      • getServerUptime

        private double getServerUptime()
        Method to return the uptime of the server. Method get the current system time and minuses the time set when the Server constructor was called on server startup to calculate running time.
        Returns:
        The server uptime in milliseconds.

      • getUsrName

        private java.lang.String getUsrName()
        Method to get the user name of the Client that calls the method. Method returns the instance of the username for that client.
        Returns:
        username of the client

      • getUsrNum

        private int getUsrNum()
        Method to get the number of users online. Method returns the size of the usrNameSet
        Returns:
        Size of HashSet storing each username.

      • setUsrName

        private void setUsrName()
        Method to set a unique username for the client attempting to joing the chatroom. Method takes input through the serverReader and checks that username is unique against those already stored in the usrNameSet. It then broadcasts a message to alert all users that a new user is online and stores the system time in clientChatroomTime
